description: The image features a presentation slide titled "squint Sales Deck." The design is modern and minimalistic, with a dark background that highlights the white text and logo. The logo consists of abstract geometric shapes, adding a contemporary touch. In the background, there is a blurred image of an industrial setting, possibly a factory or manufacturing environment, which adds depth and context to the slide. The overall mood is professional and sleek, suggesting a focus on technology or industry.

The image shows a smartphone displaying an augmented reality interface. The screen features a detailed, industrial machine with a focus on a specific component, highlighted by a blue overlay. The interface includes numbered steps and directional arrows, guiding the user to "Rotate Valve" and providing instructions to "Place nest on right side of DB. Rotate clockwise to lock the nest in." The background of the machine is a cool blue, creating a high-tech, futuristic mood. The overall composition is clean and organized, with clear visual cues for user interaction.

The image features a digital display showcasing a website on a tablet. The website has a clean, modern design with a focus on industrial technology. At the top, there's a bold headline: "Insight, in sight." Below it, a subheading explains the purpose of the platform, emphasizing data entry and operational expertise.

The central visual element is a large image of a factory or industrial setting, with machinery and equipment visible. Superimposed on this is a smartphone displaying a close-up of machinery, highlighting a specific function with a blue marker and text: "Rotate the valve clockwise to confirm the workpiece clamp."

The composition is balanced, with the tablet and smartphone creating a layered effect, drawing attention to the integration of technology in industrial processes. The overall mood is professional and innovative, suggesting efficiency and expertise in industrial operations. The color scheme is predominantly cool tones, with blues and grays, enhancing the technological theme.

The image shows a smartphone displaying an app interface. The screen features a step-by-step guide with a blurred background image of a worker in a blue uniform and white helmet operating industrial equipment, possibly pipes or valves. The text on the screen includes:

1. "Clean surface area"
2. "Turn the knob"
3. "Record the gauge reading before"

A prominent red button at the bottom is likely for recording. The overall color scheme is dark with blue tones, creating a professional and industrial mood. The composition is clean and focused on functionality, with clear text and a straightforward layout.

The image shows an identification badge with a gray lanyard attached. The badge features a circular photo of a person wearing a safety helmet, suggesting a professional setting. Below the photo, the name "Bill Murphy" is printed, followed by the title "Safety & Training Manager." At the bottom, the company name "Berkshire Hathaway Energy" is displayed. The design is clean and professional, with a monochromatic color scheme that emphasizes clarity and formality. The overall mood is corporate and authoritative.
